item.title: About me
item.description: Hello! I am Shubham Gandhi .I am a final year computer science undergrad. I am Software Enginner.I am also FOSS and Blockchain enthusiast.I have experience in Database Designing,Microservice Architecture and Implementing REST APIs.This Summer I worked with Seaflux technologies pvt. ltd.,Ahmedabad as Node.JS intern.I am also Incoming Associate Software Enginner üñ• at Jeavio,Vadodra. I have worked on JavaScript and it’s various framework, I am comfortable with Docker ,Kubernetes ,Node.JS and git.
